name: Untitled Sport Game
description:
A fast-paced sports game, inspired by air hockey and tennis. The game contains single-player and local-multiplayer modes.

Rules:

- First player to 10 points wins.

- The ball can’t stay in your half of the court for more than 3 seconds at a time.

Controls(player 1):

WASD - Move

J - Shoot

K - Jump

Controls(player 2):

Arrow keys - Move

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Jump

Created as part of Ludum Dare 46.
